title: Creating and Using HARPA AI Commands
description: Detailed guide on creating custom HARPA AI commands for enhancing web automation and interaction. Learn to format commands in YAML, enabling HARPA AI to perform complex web tasks with simple triggers.

details.example: /commandName - Triggers a specific action or workflow within HARPA AI.
Navigate to the HARPA AI dashboard, select 'Custom Commands', and click on 'Create New Command'.

YAML Example for a Custom Command:

```yaml
- command: '/customCommandName'
  description: 'This custom command does something special.'
  actions:
    - action: 'navigate'
      parameters:
        url: 'https://example.com'
    - action: 'extractData'
      parameters:
        dataType: 'price'
```

This YAML snippet defines a custom command named '/customCommandName' that navigates to a URL and extracts price information.
